summary: The title say all and nothing, just try it if you are looking for something of playable without denaturalize too much the original atmosphere of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Description[/size]

This is my personal enb configuration of the 0.123 enb version (and 121212 also, thanks to Boris Vorontsov), it\'s setted to be realistic with the darkness of the night in absence of any source of light from the sky and[u] make torches and lanterns useful[/u], it didn\'t denaturalize the original color of the game too much, just few adjustment on the fire light and apparence and cover a little bit the LOD ugliness, that\'s all, check the images to make an idea about and [b]post your own images[/b], any critics about it\'s welcome, but keep in mind how and for what the original configuration it\'s made.

[size=5] [color=\"#FF0000\"] Attention: if you\'re using your own enb setting, make a copy of it! [/color] [/size]


[size=5]Update 1.1[/size]
[b]Thank to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4414993]LargeStyle[/url] to open my eyes on the current configuration, only now i noticed the difference between my really configuration and the release one, apologise for the inconvenient.[/b]

[size=5]Update 1.2[/size]
Version for 121212 ENB config added, minor tweak on the lens reflection effect done, plus some minor tweaks on the aurora also, check the screenshots.

[size=5]To install:[/size] 

- Download the 121212 enb version from the [url=http://www.enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENB website[/url].
- Install the wrapper version of it.
- Download my file and put it on your Skyrim folder (where the Skyrim.exe is).
- Enjoy it!

[size=5]To unistall:[/size]

-Delete my files from your Skyrim folder, or just push the Shift button with F12 to disable.

[size=5][color=\"#2E8B57\"]FAQ:[/color][/size]

- Q: It\'s compatible with Climates of Tamriel?
  A: Yes, it\'s suggest also.

- Q:In game the night it\'s too darkness?
  A: Read the description.


Make any question you want after the hoped read of the this \"mod\" page, post your images and suggest also;
Last words, install mods just like[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17605] CLARALUX [/url]from MGE, useful with this configuration.

[size=5]Suggested mods or tools:[/size]

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17605]CLARALUX [/url] from MGE;
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/814/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D814]Skyrim configurator[/url] from pfannkuchen_gesicht;
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8035/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D8035]THIRD PERSON CAMBAT CAMERA almost vanilla[/url] by mtgAzim;

Credits:

This the little moment of glory, don\'t know how to start suitably:

Credits and thanks to [url=http://www.enbdev.com/index_en.htm] Boris Vorontsov for his work and his community[/url].
Credits to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1538812]MGE[/url] maker of CLARALUX.
Thanks to Rhaegal (aka[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2504170] avatarxrevenge[/url])from [url=http://www.rpgitalia.net/]RPG Italia communty[/url] for the beta test.
Credits to Bethesda for this game.
author: Darkgondul
